videos.title: Technical Videos
videos.description: Video tutorials and technical talks about Elasticsearch, AI, and software development.

list.title: How to build an Ollama RAG app using Elasticsearch with Go
list.description: Step-by-step guide to building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation application with Ollama and Elasticsearch using the Go programming language.

list.title: How to Ingest Data into Elasticsearch via Kafka
list.description: Learn the best practices for ingesting and streaming data from Apache Kafka into Elasticsearch for real-time analytics.

list.title: How to match CVs to jobs in Elasticsearch with semantic text & LLMs
list.description: Learn how to build an intelligent CV-to-job matching system using Elasticsearch's semantic text capabilities and Large Language Models.

list.title: How to Use AutoGen Agents + Elasticsearch for Job Matching
list.description: Discover how to leverage AutoGen agents with Elasticsearch to create an automated job matching system powered by AI.

list.title: Spring AI & Elasticsearch: How to build a RAG system in Java
list.description: Build a powerful RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system using Spring AI framework and Elasticsearch in Java.

list.title: Ollama & Elasticsearch: How to use Ollama with the Inference API
list.description: Explore how to integrate Ollama with Elasticsearch's Inference API to add AI capabilities to your search applications.

articles.title: Technical Articles
articles.description: Deep dives into Elasticsearch, AI/GenAI integrations, and full-stack development. Published on Elasticsearch Labs.

list.description: RAGenda: An AI-powered meeting companion that utilizes Cohere's connectors ecosystem to streamline and improve meeting management. Features personalized agendas, live chat, sentiment analysis, and detailed post-meeting reports.
ContentCompass: Elevate Your Content with Precision - An innovative AI solution for content creation and optimization using Gemini AI.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Solutions focused on delivering real value and solving meaningful problems.

list.name: CSS-Tailwind Converter
list.tagline: Convert CSS to Tailwind CSS instantly
list.problem: Developers waste hours manually converting existing CSS codebases to Tailwind CSS, slowing down migration projects.
list.solution: An AI-powered tool that automatically converts CSS code to Tailwind CSS classes, maintaining design fidelity and reducing migration time by 80%.
list.impact: Accelerates CSS to Tailwind migration projects, maintains design fidelity during conversion, and reduces manual conversion errors with AI-powered precision.

list.name: CV Analyzer
list.problem: Job seekers struggle to optimize their resumes for ATS systems and specific job requirements, resulting in missed opportunities.
list.solution: An intelligent CV analysis tool that provides personalized feedback, keyword optimization, and formatting suggestions using AI.
list.impact: Helps optimize CVs for ATS systems, provides personalized feedback, and suggests format improvements to better match job requirements.

about-me.title: Who am I
about-me.description: I'm Jeffrey Rengifo, a Technical Writer and Elastic Consultant specializing in Elasticsearch, GenAI, and full-stack development. I create technical content, build AI-powered solutions, and optimize search systems. Passionate about solving complex problems through innovative technology and delivering impactful results.
